issue.title: 使用了nacos作为dubbo的服务注册与发现，springboot容器关闭后再启动，nacos的线程没有关闭干净

comment.body: 这个异常看异常栈，应该是触发InstancesChangeEvent时，dubbo的ThreadPoolExecutor已经被shutdown导致了，dubbo应该需要检查一下线程池是否shutdown再进行处理~

issue.title: 建议去掉contextPath默认值contextPath=/nacos或默认为/
issue.body:
当nacos服务没有指定contextPath，即直接通过域名访问时，如： https://xxx.com     nacos-client默认会在 https://xxx.com 后面加上/nacos 导致请求nacos配置时报403或其他错误，目前发现的有：
1、使用dubbo时，在dubbo.registry下是没有配置contextPath的地方的，必须在启动的时候通过System.setProperty("contextPath","/"); 指定。
2、使用nacos-config-spring-boot-starter 时必须配置acos.config.context-path=/ 才能正常使用。
不能默认为/  有cotextPath的时候再配置吗？特别是使用dubbo等第三框架时没有配置contxtPath的地方，特别不友好，而且文档上也没有说明会给定默认值

comment.body: 可以通过修改server.servlet.contextPath这个配置，但是不确定静态资源会不会有问题

issue.title: 使用了nacos作为dubbo的服务注册与发现，springboot容器关闭后再启动，nacos的线程没有关闭干净

forkee.name: nacos
forkee.description: an easy-to-use dynamic service discovery, configuration and service management platform for building cloud native applications.

issue.title: Nacos 配置中心和注册中心分离部署
issue.body:
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
nacos 注册中心和配置中心可以分离部署，但是如何做，没有找到好的资料！
应该是有不同的编译命令？

Describe the solution you'd like
希望 提供可独立编译的模块，比如独立部署 config 模块，包含了核心功能 和 管理台

现状
执行全量的编译打包，
执行 bin/startup.sh -f config
    展示效果 可以看到服务管理页面 =====》不符合预期
执行 bin/startup.sh -f naming
   展示效果 看不到 配置页面 ======》符合预期

希望效果：
即使 bin/startups.h -f config 页面可以隐藏掉 服务管理页面，其实也不太符合预期
因为 后端代码没有分离，只是控制台展示上隐藏了一个 tab，本质是骗人的。

comment.body:
> > 可以参考distribution模块里的配置，将依赖分离打包部署。
> > `startup.sh -f config`这种方式是1.x支持的，在2.x版本下已经年久失修，如果有思路也欢迎贡献PR。
> 
> OK

请问您是否已成功分离打包？
我看官网源码编译的命令是
mvn -Prelease-nacos -Dmaven.test.skip=true clean install -U 

因此我如果只想编译naming的话，我使用了如下命令：
mvn -Prelease-naming -Dmaven.test.skip=true clean install -U 
但是当我进入target目录，里面确实产生了ans目录及相关的压缩包，但是当我进入ans/bin目录下，执行如命令：
startup.cmd -m standalone出现了Eorror，具体为Unable to access jarFile   xxxxxx.nacos-server.jar

我想知道正确的分离打包方式是怎样的？

issue.title: Nacos Spring Boot 快速开始，无法读取配置中心的值
issue.body:
官方文档地址，[https://nacos.io/zh-cn/docs/quick-start-spring-boot.html](https://nacos.io/zh-cn/docs/quick-start-spring-boot.html)

完全按照这个文档来的，pom.xml中的版本，和官方的[示例工程](https://github.com/nacos-group/nacos-examples/tree/master/nacos-spring-boot-example/nacos-spring-boot-config-example)的版本保持一致。

一开始使用最新的版本，无法获取，后面降级到和官方的[示例工程](https://github.com/nacos-group/nacos-examples/tree/master/nacos-spring-boot-example/nacos-spring-boot-config-example)的版本一致的版本。


结果：
无法获取nacos中配置的数据值，是我食用方式不对吗？

issue.title: [ISSUE #11216]Declare httpcore as direct dependency to fix its version.
issue.body:
Please do not create a Pull Request without creating an issue first.

## What is the purpose of the change

Upgrade the nacos-client's dependency httpcore's version from 4.4.6 to 4.4.15 for downstream projects.

## Brief changelog


## Verifying this change
The nacos-client declare httpasyncclient of version 4.1.3 which introduces httpcore 4.4.6. However, currently the version of httpcore in nacos-client is 4.4.15 instead of 4.4.6, since it's a transitive dependency whose version is controlled by the spring-boot-dependencies in the dependency management block of the nacos-all pom.
```
|  +- org.apache.httpcomponents:httpcore:jar:4.4.15:compile (version managed from 4.4.6)

```
```
           <dependency>
                <!-- Import dependency management from Spring Boot -->
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${spring-boot-dependencies.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
``` 
 The problem is when downstream projects use nacos-client as their dependency, the dependency management won't work there. And therefore, httpcore 4.4.6 is used instead of 4.4.15 version, causing incapatibilities since nacos-client is using 4.4.15 actually. Declaring httpcore as the direct dependency of nacos-client helps solve the problem.

## Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

* [x] Make sure there is a Github issue filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a Github issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue.
* [x] Format the pull request title like `[ISSUE #123] Fix UnknownException when host config not exist`. Each commit in the pull request should have a meaningful subject line and body.
* [ ] Write a pull request description that is detailed enough to understand what the pull request does, how, and why.
* [ ] Write necessary unit-test to verify your logic correction, more mock a little better when cross module dependency exist. If the new feature or significant change is committed, please remember to add integration-test in [test module](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/tree/master/test).
* [ ] Run `mvn -B clean package apache-rat:check findbugs:findbugs -Dmaven.test.skip=true` to make sure basic checks pass. Run `mvn clean install -DskipITs` to make sure unit-test pass. Run `mvn clean test-compile failsafe:integration-test`  to make sure integration-test pass.

comment.body:
[![CLA assistant check](https://cla-assistant.io/pull/badge/not_signed)](https://cla-assistant.io/alibaba/nacos?pullRequest=11293)
Thank you for your submission! We really appreciate it. Like many open source projects, we ask that you sign our [Contributor License Agreement](https://cla-assistant.io/alibaba/nacos?pullRequest=11293) before we can accept your contribution.
You have signed the CLA already but the status is still pending? Let us [recheck](https://cla-assistant.io/check/alibaba/nacos?pullRequest=11293) it.

pull_request.body:
Please do not create a Pull Request without creating an issue first.

## What is the purpose of the change

Upgrade the nacos-client's dependency httpcore's version from 4.4.6 to 4.4.15 for downstream projects.

## Brief changelog


## Verifying this change
The nacos-client declare httpasyncclient of version 4.1.3 which introduces httpcore 4.4.6. However, currently the version of httpcore in nacos-client is 4.4.15 instead of 4.4.6, since it's a transitive dependency whose version is controlled by the spring-boot-dependencies in the dependency management block of the nacos-all pom.
```
|  +- org.apache.httpcomponents:httpcore:jar:4.4.15:compile (version managed from 4.4.6)

```
```
           <dependency>
                <!-- Import dependency management from Spring Boot -->
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${spring-boot-dependencies.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
``` 
 The problem is when downstream projects use nacos-client as their dependency, the dependency management won't work there. And therefore, httpcore 4.4.6 is used instead of 4.4.15 version, causing incapatibilities since nacos-client is using 4.4.15 actually. Declaring httpcore as the direct dependency of nacos-client helps solve the problem.

* [x] Make sure there is a Github issue filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a Github issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue.

issue.title: 建议去掉contextPath默认值contextPath=/nacos或默认为/
issue.body:
当nacos服务没有指定contextPath，即直接通过域名访问时，如： https://xxx.com     nacos-client默认会在 https://xxx.com 后面加上/nacos 导致请求nacos配置时报403或其他错误，目前发现的有：
1、使用dubbo时，在dubbo.registry下是没有配置contextPath的地方的，必须在启动的时候通过System.setProperty("contextPath","/"); 指定。
2、使用nacos-config-spring-boot-starter 时必须配置acos.config.context-path=/ 才能正常使用。
不能默认为/  有cotextPath的时候再配置吗？特别是使用dubbo等第三框架时没有配置contxtPath的地方，特别不友好，而且文档上也没有说明会给定默认值

comment.body: 有没有contextPath应该让用户来选择是否需要，而不是默认给定一个，这样更符合使用习惯
